DellWitnessServer.description: Oem properties for representing Witness Server properties.
DellWitnessServer.longDescription: Oem properties for representing Witness Server properties.

DellWitnessServerObject.description: An Oem extension to represent Witness Server Node related properties in the chassis.
DellWitnessServerObject.longDescription: An Oem extension to represent Witness Server Node related properties in the chassis.

Eppid.description: A string that contains the EPPID of the Witness Server.
Eppid.longDescription: A string that contains the EPPID of the Witness Server.

HeartBeat.description: The property shall represent the policy for physical disks included in the virtual disk.
HeartBeat.longDescription: The property shall represent the policy for physical disks included in the virtual disk.

Mac1.description: A string that contains the MAC address of port 1 of witness server.
Mac1.longDescription: A string that contains the MAC address of port 1 of witness server.

Mac2.description: A string that contains the MAC address of port 2 of witness server.
Mac2.longDescription: A string that contains the MAC address of port 2 of witness server.

POSTCode.description: A string that contains the BIOS POST code of witness server.
POSTCode.longDescription: A string that contains the BIOS POST code of witness server.

PowerConsumptioninWatts.description: Power Consumption of Witness server in Watts.
PowerConsumptioninWatts.longDescription: Power Consumption of witness server in Watts.

Status.description: An array of status values of witness server.
Status.longDescription: An array of status values of witness server.

SystemID.description: A string that contains the SystemID of witness server.
SystemID.longDescription: A string that contains the SystemID of witness server.
